title: Resolve ide0040, ide0051, ide0052, ide0350 warnings
body:
These are showing up when building with a recent .NET 10 SDK. This allows us to remove the warnAsError=false flag in the VMR when building msbuild

Review with hide whitespaces toggled one:

commit.message:
Resolve ide0040, ide0051, ide0052, ide0350 warnings

These are showing up when building with a recent .NET 10 SDK.
This allows us to remove the warnAsError=false flag in the VMR when building msbuild

nodes.body: Can you please also merge this PR? I don't have permissions to do so.
